function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Need for interdisciplinary collaboration in handling the crisis","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of research on factors influencing ppe production, distribution, and usage","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deficiency in pandemic spark assessment and prior containment strategies","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Feasibility and cost issues in implementing strategic protocols","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Search databases may not cover all relevant articles related to contagious diseases like covid-19","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete or inaccurate search queries may result in irrelevant or biased results","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited coverage of historical literature may result in incomplete understanding of pandemic trends and strategies","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The spread of covid-19 in cities and countries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for recurring public-health emergencies in modern cities and society","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global contagion of infectious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urban marginalization and disease outbreaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Response to contagious cities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid urban population growth and high-rise density","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sprawling suburban development","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global interconnectedness of cities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informal settlements devoid of governance, design, services, and legal status","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequalities in access to sanitation and homelessness","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in managing high-rise-dense cities during pandemics","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proliferation of emergency measures during crisis","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk-literate urban citizenry leveraging crisis-information repositories for long-term impact","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proliferation of mutual aid groups and initiatives increases the risk of disease transmission within these groups.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate recognition of at-risk groups by local authorities increases the vulnerability of these populations to contagious diseases.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data, global connectivity challenges, and closing borders hinder effective disease monitoring and control by city governments.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential overcrowding in public venues and transport","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinformation and job precarity leading to challenges","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate city infrastructure and design for disease management","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Frequent movement of people across the globe","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Antimicrobial resistance and bioterrorism threat","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limiting nosocomial spread of infection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in infectious period and asymptomatic cases for covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure of social distancing measures to curb disease transmission","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on herd immunity to combat covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public acceptance of social distancing measures","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective implementation of multiple layers of social distancing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clarity on duration and extent of social distancing measures","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing measures","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of community engagement in containment strategy","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scientific uncertainties about covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Travel contributing to disease transmission","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lockdown measures and temperature screening in public places","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Model-based predictions for mitigation measures","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Herd immunity and vaccine effectiveness in ageing populations","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on herd immunity as a control strategy for contagious diseases","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in the percentage of recovered patients required for herd immunity","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in herd immunity estimates among countries","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on herd immunity as a primary strategy for disease mitigation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient herd immunity to protect the population during a second epidemic wave","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
